title: Authors

title: pkgdown Template for rOpenGov Packages
text: package pkgdown template adapted rOpenGov site. private template use core rOpenGov packages. Please don’t use code.

title: pkgdown Template for rOpenGov Packages
text: possible deploy pkgdown site along rogtemplate via CI (GitHub Actions) locally, provides control automatic.

what: Option A: Deploy using GitHub Actions
title: pkgdown Template for rOpenGov Packages
text: necessary install rogtemplate . Just copy file .github/workflows/ folder. action create site gh-pages branch.

title: pkgdown Template for rOpenGov Packages
text: can install rogtemplate using r-universe: can use also remotes package: can use rog_actions_pkgdown_branch() setting action described deployment still performed GitHub action. building locally package docs folder use: Note rogtemplate::rog_add_template_pkgdown() creates _pkgdown.yml file (modify existing one) following lines: lines tells pkgdown use rogtemplate.
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(   ropengov = "https://ropengov.r-universe.dev",   CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org" ))  # Install some packages install.packages("rogtemplate") library(remotes) install_github("ropengov/rogtemplate", dependencies = TRUE) rogtemplate::rog_build()  # or you can use also  rogtemplate::rog_add_template_pkgdown() pkgdown::build_site() template:   package: rogtemplate

title: pkgdown Template for rOpenGov Packages
text: Last step commit GitHub, wait GitHub action ends (case chose deploy way) deploy website via YOUR_GITHUB_REPO>Settings>GitHub Pages.

title: pkgdown Template for rOpenGov Packages
text: provide also additional extra functions creating badges logos, see Extras info.

what: Creates a GitHub action that deploys on gh-pages branch — rog_actions_pkgdown_branch
title: Creates a GitHub action that deploys on gh-pages branch — rog_actions_pkgdown_branch
text: GitHub action created build pkgdown package gh-pages branch repo.

title: Creates a GitHub action that deploys on gh-pages branch — rog_actions_pkgdown_branch
Creates a GitHub action that deploys on gh-pages branch — rog_actions_pkgdown_branch
text: pkg Path package.

title: Creates a GitHub action that deploys on gh-pages branch — rog_actions_pkgdown_branch
text: overwrite Overwrite action already present.

what: Configure rogtemplate for your pkgdown site — rog_add_template_pkgdown
title: Configure rogtemplate for your pkgdown site — rog_add_template_pkgdown
text: Add corresponding configuration _pkgdown.yml. present, create file pkgdown/_pkgdown.yml. also add corresponding lines .Rbuildignore

title: Configure rogtemplate for your pkgdown site — rog_add_template_pkgdown

what: Add a rOpenGov badge to your README file — rog_badge_ropengov
title: Add a rOpenGov badge to your README file — rog_badge_ropengov
text: Add rOpenGov badge pointing http://ropengov.org/ README file:

title: Add a rOpenGov badge to your README file — rog_badge_ropengov
Add a rOpenGov badge to your README file — rog_badge_ropengov
text: install TRUE/FALSE. TRUE badge installed README.md/.Rmd. FALSE message Rmarkdown code displayed.

title: Add a rOpenGov badge to your README file — rog_badge_ropengov
text: markdown badge message markdown code pasted.

what: Build your pkgdown website locally — rog_build
title: Build your pkgdown website locally — rog_build
text: wrapper pkgdown::build_site()

title: Build your pkgdown website locally — rog_build
Build your pkgdown website locally — rog_build
text: pkg Path package.

title: Build your pkgdown website locally — rog_build
text: ... Arguments passed rog_logo, pkgdown::build_siteoverwriteShould current logo overwritten? TRUE run usethis::use_logo().     faviconsLogical, want create favicons pkgdown::build_favicons()?     examplesRun examples?     run_dont_runRun examples surrounded \dontrun?     seedSeed used initialize random examples reproducible.     lazyIf TRUE, rebuild articles reference pages source newer destination.     previewIf TRUE, .na(preview) && interactive(), preview freshly generated section browser.     develUse development deployment process?TRUE, uses lighter-weight process suitable rapid iteration; run examples vignettes current process, load code pkgload::load_all().FALSE, first install package temporary library, run examples vignettes new process.build_site() defaults devel = FALSE get high fidelity outputs building complete site; build_reference(), build_home() friends default devel = TRUE can rapidly iterate development.     new_processIf TRUE, run build_site() separate process. enhances reproducibility ensuring nothing loaded current process affects build process.     installIf TRUE, install package temporary library available vignettes.     documentDeprecated Use devel instead.

title: Build your pkgdown website locally — rog_build
text: function call also rog_add_template_pkgdown() rog_logo().

what: Creates a logo for your rOpenGov package — rog_logo
title: Creates a logo for your rOpenGov package — rog_logo
text: Creates logo automatically hexSticker::sticker(). Optionally, create also favicons pkgdown::build_favicons().

title: Creates a logo for your rOpenGov package — rog_logo
code: rog_logo(   pkgname,   filename = "man/figures/logo.png",   overwrite = FALSE,   favicons = TRUE )

title: Creates a logo for your rOpenGov package — rog_logo
text: pkgname Name package. present autodetected function.

title: Creates a logo for your rOpenGov package — rog_logo
text: filename filename save sticker

title: Creates a logo for your rOpenGov package — rog_logo
text: overwrite current logo overwritten? TRUE run usethis::use_logo().

title: Creates a logo for your rOpenGov package — rog_logo
text: favicons Logical, want create favicons pkgdown::build_favicons()?
